parameter map.label: RVSR_SLV
parameter map.desc: Reverse ring-interconnetc direction (0x1 causes CW RX pkts to go out on CCW TX

parameter map.label: BRDY_SLV
parameter map.desc: Ready signal to fifo holding bulk data ( bit 0 = ready to fifo holding data destined for CW;  bit 4 = ready to fifo holding data destined for CCW;

parameter map.label: CW_L_SLV
parameter map.desc: Bulk data, CW Fifo fullness level

parameter map.label: CCWL_SLV
parameter map.desc: Bulk data, CCW Fifo fullness level

parameter map.label: STBT_SLV
parameter map.desc: Time at which a timing-pulse will be emitted

parameter map.label: CSEL_SLV
parameter map.desc: records the selected rxoutclk ( bit 0 = cw, bit 1 = ccw)

parameter map.label: TMSP_SLV
parameter map.desc: snapshot of the current time according to CW rx engine
